text: Continuing from the HSK 1 dialogue: this is what happens after staying home for a week. The dialogue concludes at HSK 3 level. The conversation has an informal tone.妈妈：八点钟了，该起床吃早餐了！我：妈妈，才八点，还很早，我再睡一会儿。妈妈：已经不早了，吃完早餐再睡吧。我：好的。吃完早餐后妈妈：你的房间太脏了，该扫地了，不要睡了。每天都出去跟朋友玩，也不在家陪陪我们。我：那好吧。Mother：It’s 8 o’clock, it’s time to get up and eat breakfast.Me：Mother, it’s only 8 o’clock. It’s still early. I’ll sleep a bit longer.Mother：It’s not early, sleep again after breakfast.Me：Ok.Mother：Your room is messy, you should clean it. Don’t sleep. Go out and see your friends everyday, don’t stay at home with us all the time.Me：Alright then.1 – 妈妈早上几点叫我起床？a. 五点b. 八点c. 七点d. 九点2 – 妈妈说我什么时候可以再睡觉？a. 吃早餐前b. 不可以c. 洗澡后d. 吃早餐后1. b2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
